divs: Sighting DetailsI feel that your readers and UFO reporters should not be surprised to know that there are government debunkers working at UFO reporting agencies. The recent valid reports submited will often be debunked before your readers even view them. It happened to me and worst yet is that some of the most important sightings might never get out to the public. You should ask yourself, why is the government still into debunking if they aren't hiding anything.
Summary: government debunkers working at MUFON and other web sites
